Text:
Thanks.

My son will enjoy these.

Try rubbing a little petroleum jelly/vaseline into the scratches, just a tiny bit, then rub off clean.

This is a method to get scratched CD's/DVD's to read, then copy to hard drive and reburn.

May work, may not, but worth the try.

Peace. : )
Thanks for the tip, will definitely try it. Enjoy!
Would you seed this please? Been trying to get it for ages!
